title: Love Me Love My Dog
original_name: ラブミー・ラブマイドッグ
sinopse:
Akihiko, a bisexual author with a casual approach to sex, is put in the care of rookie editor Aiichirou, a diligent and naïve young man who has always admired Akihiko as an author. With their different views on life, what will happen when Aiichirou walks in on him sharing a bed with a man?!

(Source: MU)
